Study: Features of 20 133 UK patients in hospital with covid-19 using the ISARIC WHO Clinical Characterisation Protocol: prospective observational cohort study.
Study Population: 208 acute care hospitals in England, Wales, and Scotland between 6 February and 19 April 2020

Study: Effect of underlying comorbidities on the infection and severity of COVID-19 in South Korea
Study Population: The insurance claims database of the HIRA of South Korea through April 8, 2020

Study: Characteristics and outcomes of a cohort of SARS-CoV-2 patients in the Province of Reggio
Study Population: All symptomatic patients who tested positive in Reggio from February 27 to April 2, 2020.

Study: Characteristics and outcomes of a cohort of SARS-CoV-2 patients in the Province of Reggio
Study Population: All patients in Reggio Emilia, Italiy from Feb 27 to April 2, 2022

Study: Clinical Presentation of COVID19 in Dementia Patients
Study Population: Respiratory failure patients in COVID wards in Acute Hospital in Brescia province, Northern Italy.
